programme.title: Michael Fay in Singapore
programme.short_synopsis: What can the arrest of Michael Fay, an American in Singapore, tells us about the country?
programme.medium_synopsis: Following the detention of 18 year old Michael Fay, an American citizen in Singapore, Alistair Cooke looks at what Fay's treatment can tell us about Singapore.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
